messages.messageBody:
you all gotta see this:
http://www.gyuzo.com/sinsen-gumi.htm
the locations should be very familiar to Shinsengumi fans

2 Shinsengumi contests:

1) sponsored by Barb
http://community.livejournal.com/wolves_of_mibu/33951.html
PRIZE: copy of soon to be very popular novel
http://www.dragonsdisiple.com
DUE DATE: 4th of July

2) sponsored by secretarytocapt3
http://community.livejournal.com/edo_meiji/26900.html
PRIZE: *imported from Japan* Shinsengumi haori AND hakama
DUE DATE: 4th of July (midnight)

pick one or just do both! Pleeeaaaaase
